quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as if nothing is a miracle. The other is as if everything is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.
author: Bob Proctor

quote: No man is happy unless he believes he is.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.
author: Les Brown

quote: A mountain never yields to the wind no matter how strong it is.
author: Zen Proverb
